description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73a) to vary condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of planning permission ref: 194784FUL dated 29/05/2020 for: Part change of use from bakery (Use Class A1) to residential (Use Class C3); first floor rear/side infill extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension; roof extensions to rear outrigger roof slopes; conversion part of the property into 3 self-contained flats. Variation seeks to alter the internal layout and use of ground floor shop unit as office and staff accommodation
decision_conditions: The developer has failed to provide consistent information, namely inconsistencies with the built development and submitted existing plans therefore, the local planning authority is unable to make an informed determination due to inconsistencies in information submitted. | The proposed (Flat 3) by reason of its insufficient internal floorspace would result in a substandard living accommodation to the detriment of living conditions of future occupiers, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 12, Housing SPG GLA 2016, policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies 3.5 and 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1, 1.2 and 2.1 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012). | The subdivision of the proposed staff room from the commercial floorspace creating a separate entity would constitute a contrived and poor internal layout be harmful to the character of the local area and contrary to the pattern of development within the vicinity of the site, contrary to National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12, policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
